name: Toy wars (lootss)
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #23

Theme: "Tiny world"

Wildcard: Wherefore art thou ? (Let the player name the protagonist)

---

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Arrow keys to shoot

---

This is my first GWJ, I will definitely be entering again in the future! I learned a lot making this :)

I wasn't very inspired by the "Tiny World" theme, so if the toy thing seems kind of slapped on the project at the last minute, that's because it is... But the wildcard about naming the protagonist gave me the idea of the name chosen by the player affecting their stats, so that's what I tried to accomplish.

I only had the week-end to work on it so it's not much of a game, especially the art (mostly inexistant) and "AI" (enemies are just randomly moving and shooting).
